mapper.sql: SELECT id, content, file_name, suffix, file_url, created_by_id, created_by_name, created_at, updated_at FROM file_resources
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_resources ( content, file_name, suffix, file_url, created_by_id, created_by_name, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{content}, #{fileName}, #{suffix}, #{fileUrl}, #{createdById}, #{createdByName}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE file_resources SET content = #{content}, file_name = #{fileName}, suffix = #{suffix}, file_url = #{fileUrl}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
